    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3

    Facet FormOfPayment_BankAccount

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:FormOfPayment_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:FormOfPayment_Summary
          • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:FormOfPayment_BankAccount

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<FormOfPaymentBankAccount costCenterID="Example String Value" guaranteeID="Example String Value" guaranteeIndicatorInd="true" objID="formOfPayment_1" paymentTransactionTypeCode="charge" remark="Example String Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3">
    <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
    <FormOfPaymentRef>formOfPayment_1</FormOfPaymentRef>
    <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
    <GuaranteeTypeCode>Air travel card</GuaranteeTypeCode>
    <BankAcct checkNumber="999" checksAcceptedInd="true">
        <PrivacyGroup optInDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" optInStatus="OptedOut" optOutDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" shareMarketInd="Inherit" shareSyncInd="Yes"/>
        <BankAcctName>Example String Value</BankAcctName>
        <BankAcctNumber authenticationMethod="SecurityCode" encryptedValue="5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc" encryptionKey="KHC32198gt4" encryptionKeyMethod="RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey" encryptionMethod="Triple DES" mask="xxxxxxxxxxxx9922" token="AEGHV234AUD54367" tokenProviderID="Shift4 (payment)">
            <PlainText>Example String Value</PlainText>
            <Warning code="2" docURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" language="en" nodeList="Example String Value" recordID="Example String Value" shortText="Example String Value" status="Complete" statusExtension="status_Other_Value" tag="Example String Value" type="Advisory" typeExtension="type_Other_Value">Example String Value</Warning>
        </BankAcctNumber>
        <BankID authenticationMethod="MagneticStripe" encryptedValue="5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc" encryptionKey="KHC32198gt4" encryptionKeyMethod="RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey" encryptionMethod="Triple DES" mask="xxxxxxxxxxxx9922" token="AEGHV234AUD54367" tokenProviderID="Shift4 (payment)">
            <PlainText>Example String Value</PlainText>
            <Warning code="2" docURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" language="en" nodeList="Example String Value" recordID="Example String Value" shortText="Example String Value" status="Incomplete" statusExtension="status_Other_Value" tag="Example String Value" type="Application error" typeExtension="type_Other_Value">Example String Value</Warning>
        </BankID>
        <Type accountCode="Example String Value" description="Visa" id="bankAccountType_1" listBankAccountType="Savings" listBankAccountTypeExtension="listBankAccountType_Other_Value" name="Example String Value" uRL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00"/>
    </BankAcct>
</FormOfPaymentBankAccount>
